001/**
002 * Handles data retrieval for ingredients from the database
003 * @author Aarya Patel
004*/
005package src.data;
006
007import java.sql.*;
008import java.util.*;
009import src.database.dbConnect;
010import src.model.ingredient;
011
012public class ingredientsData {
013
014    /**
015     * This function takes a query and formats the results of the query into the ingredient class objects for easier backend handling of inventory
016     * @param query - The SQL query string to execute
017     * @return - A list of ingredient objects retrieved from the database
018     */
019    private static List<ingredient> getIngredients(String query) {
020
021        Connection conn = null;
022        try {
023            conn = dbConnect.getConnection();
024        } catch (SQLException e) {
025            e.printStackTrace();
026        }
027
028        List<ingredient> ingredients = new ArrayList<>();
029        Statement stmt = null;
030        try {
031            stmt = conn.createStatement();
032        } catch (SQLException e) {
033            e.printStackTrace();
034        }
035
036        ResultSet rs = null;
037        try {
038            rs = stmt.executeQuery(query);
039        } catch (SQLException e) {
040            e.printStackTrace();
041        }
042
043        try {
044            while (rs.next()) {
045                ingredients.add(new ingredient(
046                    rs.getInt("ingredientid"),
047                    rs.getDouble("currentquantity"),
048                    rs.getDouble("minquantity"),
049                    rs.getDouble("orderquantity"),
050                    rs.getDouble("price"),
051                    rs.getInt("expirytime"),
052                    rs.getDate("purchased"),
053                    rs.getString("ingredientname")
054                ));
055            }
056        } catch (SQLException e) {
057            e.printStackTrace();
058        }
059        return ingredients;
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Retrieves all ingredients from the database.
064     * @return - A list of all ingredient objects in the database
065     */
066    public static List<ingredient> getIngredients() {
067        return getIngredients("SELECT * FROM ingredients");
068    }
069}
